Title: Authorizes an occupancy tax in the village of Highland Falls; provides for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
Summary: Authorizes the village of Highland Falls, in Orange county, to adopt and amend local laws imposing a tax on persons occupying a room for hire in any hotel in an amount not to exceed 3% of the per diem rental rate for each room; provides for the expiration and repeal of such provisions on December 31, 2025.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to authorizing an occupancy tax in the village of Highland Falls; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
